sentences.cn: “ 我上船来了, 汉兹先生. ” 我挖苦地说.

sentences.en: Classmates at West Point had ironically dubbed him Beauty.
sentences.cn: 西点军校的同学们曾挖苦地戏称他为“美人”。

sentences.en: He heard his voice issuing coolly, a trifle ironically.
sentences.cn: 他听见自己吐出了冷冷的, 略带点儿讥讽的声音.

sentences.en: He looked at Sohlberg smoothly , ironically, while the latter flared up.
sentences.cn: 他平静地 、 讽刺地望着苏尔白,这时苏尔白勃然大怒.

sentences.en: He smiled ironically, and Aileen, relieved, smiled with him.
sentences.cn: 他嘲弄地笑笑, 爱玲如释重负, 跟他一起笑笑.

sentences.en: His eyebrows were still ironically arched, but below them his eyes were almost calculating.
sentences.cn: 他的眉毛仍旧讥讽地挺着, 但是在眉毛下面的那对眼睛简直是一副盘算的神气.

sentences.en: I'll be bitterly merry, and ironically gay , and I'll laught in derision!
sentences.cn: 我要在苦中行乐, 在笑骂中游戏,在嘲弄中大笑!

sentences.en: In Detroit, ironically for me, the celebration took place in the ballroom of the Renaissance Center.
sentences.cn: 在底特律, 对我说来具有讽刺意味的是, 招待会竟在文艺复兴中心的舞厅举行.

sentences.en: Ironically, his cold got better on the last day of his holiday.
sentences.cn: 具有讽刺意味的是，他的感冒竟在假期的最后一天有所好转。

sentences.en: Ironically, most of the boxes seem to be labeled clothes.
sentences.cn: 讽刺的是, 多数箱子的标签上都注明是服装.

sentences.en: Ironically, most people came to watch the match on the day it poured with rain.
sentences.cn: 老天爷好像成心捉弄人, 很多人前来看比赛却偏偏下起瓢泼大雨.

sentences.en: Ironically, much of the labor - facilitating industrialization came from the rural areas themselves.
sentences.cn: 出人意外的是, 这些节省劳力的工业化,多数是从农区本身开始的.

sentences.en: Ironically, relations between British and American Intelligence in late 1950's were at their lowest postwar ebb.
sentences.cn: 然而,令人啼笑皆非的是, 50年代末,英美情报机关之间的关系处在了战后时期的最低潮.

sentences.en: Ironically, the tax burden of the extreme - ly wealthy is seldom heavy.
sentences.cn: 具有讽刺意味的是, 极为富裕的人纳税负担绝大多数都不重.

sentences.en: Suddenly Wu Sun - fu threw the newspaper aside and laughed ironically.
sentences.cn: 蓦地吴荪甫撩下了报纸,克勒一声冷笑.

sentences.en: Yet, ironically , there was seldom any difficulty in getting money for non - operational improvements.
sentences.cn: 然而, 令人啼笑皆非的是,要钱改善与飞行操作无关的项目, 却是很少碰上什么困难的.

words.tran_cn: 讽刺；反语；具有讽刺意味的事

trans.tran_cn: 嘲讽地，挖苦地，具有讽刺意味地
trans.tran_en: used when talking about a situation in which the opposite of what you expected happens or is true
